### Getting Started

# Introduction

## Welcome to the documentation

This documentation will help you get started quickly and understand the core concepts.

The documentation is organized into sections that cover different aspects of the project. Use the sidebar navigation to explore topics, or follow the getting started guide to learn the basics.

### What you'll learn

- How to set up your development environment
- Core concepts and architecture
- Best practices and patterns
- API reference and examples

### Prerequisites

Before you begin, make sure you have the following installed:

- Node.js 20 or later
- pnpm package manager
- A code editor (VS Code recommended)

[View on GitHub](https://github.com)
[Join Discord](https://discord.com)
